description: This script sets up a data analysis agent using a language database and DuckDB tools, loads a CSV dataset into a database table, and performs a query to get the average movie rating.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language database and tools to perform data analysis tasks.

classes.name: LangDB
classes.description: A language database model used as the core knowledge base for the agent.

classes.name: DuckDbTools
classes.description: A utility class for interacting with DuckDB, including creating tables from CSV files.

methods.name: DuckDbTools.create_table_from_path
methods.description: Creates a database table from a CSV file located at the specified path.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Executes a query or command and prints the response.
